## name: "RFC: Proposal" about: "Submit a formal change or extension to the T81 specification." title: "RFC: \<proposal_name>" labels: ["rfc", "proposal"]

# Summary

Describe the proposed change and its purpose.

# Motivation

Why this belongs in the T81 ecosystem.

# Specification

Provide the formal definition, rules, invariants, and semantics.

# Compatibility

List any breaking changes or required migrations.

# Alternatives

Other options considered.

# Notes

Additional context or references.
